Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Reality show that follows father and son duo Doug and Brad DeBerti who create one-of-a-kind custom cars and trucks for DeBerti Designs, their own firm, based in Arroyo Grande. Viewers will have a chance to see some high-profile projects such as a truck modeled after a fighter jet, the first ever drift-racing truck, a classic van transformed into a hot rod racing machine and many more cool projects. Besides building and customizing vehicles, Brad has another dream - to become a NASCAR driver, which he will try to do with the help from his mentor, NASCAR driver Joey Logano.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike heads to Poland to avoid the dreaded British Porsche Tax. Plus, he turns a profit on an ugly duckling Peugeot and chases a sale at Santa Pod.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global! This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Reality show that follows father and son duo Doug and Brad DeBerti who create one-of-a-kind custom cars and trucks for DeBerti Designs, their own firm, based in Arroyo Grande. Viewers will have a chance to see some high-profile projects such as a truck modeled after a fighter jet, the first ever drift-racing truck, a classic van transformed into a hot rod racing machine and many more cool projects. Besides building and customizing vehicles, Brad has another dream - to become a NASCAR driver, which he will try to do with the help from his mentor, NASCAR driver Joey Logano.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World of Cars
programme.desc: Car trader and vehicle fanatic Mike Brewer travels Britain and the United States looking for expert craftsmen in this automotive documentary series. He meets with diverse individuals who share his passion for finding, building, and most importantly, driving cars. Adding various pit stops to his jam-packed journey, including breweries, distilleries, and eateries, Mike gets stuck into the American way of life. Whether its learning more about the birth of NASCAR in Charlotte, North Carolina, meeting with the king of custom builds Gene Winfield, or seeing the work of British Motor Heritage who produce key components for Minis and MGs, each leg of his adventure is full of creative characters and superb cars.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World of Cars

Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Harpoon Hunters
programme.desc: Captain Joe takes his sons to sea aboard the Redrum, only to witness nature at its rawest. Niko hunts the seasons biggest bluefin yet, worth $10,000.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Bitchin Rides is a reality styled TV show hosted by Dave Kindig from the Salt Lake City, Utah-based company Kindig It Designs. In each episode Dave and his team review a car, create a design, then the team takes it apart and rebuilds to create a one-of-a-kind gem. Things get really ugly before they get pretty. Dave has the best team of top mechanics, technicians and fabricators in the business, quality is their only focus when they create the baddest bitchin rides.

programme.desc: A homicide suspect holding his own cousin hostage leads police on a chase through the city. Plus, a rookie cop chases a car deep into a Florida swamp.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike takes the family on a trip down memory lane. He finds new cars for his dad and sister and helps Richard Hammonds mum sell her MX5 for charity.

programme.title: Caught!
programme.desc: Protesting air passengers create turbulence for everyone on board. However, when mechanical issues arise, thats when the real chaos begins.

programme.title: Caught!
programme.desc: iPhones, dashcams, security cameras and news crews catch thrilling and dangerous moments from crimes, disasters and other events as they happen.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Indris Seid Yimer and Emyet Assen Worakis lives have been utterly transformed in the last thirty years. In 1984, they, their families and their community were engulfed in famine and devastation, a famine memorably described by BBC journalist Michael Buerk as "the closest thing to hell on Earth". Set in the Wollo area, the epicentre of the 1984 famine, the film tells their story. Other contributions featured are from people like entrepreneur Samuel Alemu and financier Ermyas Amelga. It also showcases the hauntingly beautiful UNESCO World Heritage site in Lalibela.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Volcanoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, and fires. Cataclysmic events that are capable of wiping out thousands of lives in a terribly short space of time. Then there are epidemics and pandemics, particularly chilling in their own way, because they literally and figuratively get under the skin. Lets not forget man-made disasters, the industrial accidents and environmental disasters that highlight all that is worst about our presence on this fragile blue green planet. And what is more frightening than a nuclear calamity? Accidents on the road, on rail, in the air and at sea, well, may not have quite the same deadly power as volcanoes or earthquakes; but they hold their own terrors, and are responsible for 1000s of fatalities every year. In this sobering yet thrilling final instalment of Desperate Hours we will take a look at some of the worst of the worst.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Drakelow Tunnels are a former underground military complexused mainly for storage. However, during the construction and running of this facility, 6 people are thought to have died. It is believed most of the hauntings that occur here are from the very people that died here.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Stockport and investigate an abandoned Mil, Weir Mill, said to the most haunted Mill in the UK. Demonic figures haunt anyone that enters. Will the team survive the night with the spirits?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files

Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit the old south and enjoy some sweet tea in Savannah. On this episode, well stroll the citys beautiful squares, as well as visit its civil war past at Old Fort Jackson. Then, we head up the stairs of the famous Tybee Island lighthouse and visit the Savannah Railroad museum.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: Whether you refer to Udaipur as the City of Lakes or the City of Dawn, you are sure to agree that romance and beauty fill the air. While traveling by boat, we visit the many palaces and temples on the shore. We also tour the majestic City Palace and the Garden of the Maids of Honor. In Jaipur, we tour the Pink City, paying close attention to such architectural treasures as the Palace of Winds (Hawa Mahal) and the Amber Fort. We also visit the magnificent collections housed in the City Palace.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: The name alone conjures up mysterious and exotic images. The architecture and backstory to this once powerful independent kingdom, is both amazing and horrifying. Outside the city, Zanzibar earns its "Spice Island" nickname due to the huge plantations that grow everything to make your cooking flavorful. Journeys final stop is to visit the highly endangered Red Colobus monkeys. Learn why these human-like primates eat dirt for survival.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The live music capital of the US has an interesting past. Take an in depth look at one of Austins oldest hotels, The Driskill. Then well learn about Texan independence in the Bob Bullock History museum. Finally, well end up at one of Austins most historic buildings, the Texas state capitol.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: NASAS Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europes Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: 100 years ago, two young Argentine pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, were the first men to cross the Andes Mountains through the air aboard a precarious balloon. They flew more than 8. 000 meters, from Santiago of Chile to Mendoza in Argentina. Relive the feelings and passions of two men who courageously pushed the bounds of flight in ways previously unimaginable. The first attempts to fly in early 1900 and how to fly today on the Andes mountain range.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room. Equally however there are many other assets orbiting Earth that are even more important to our everyday lives; delivering communications, weather observation, global positioning and resource management the list is growing with every year.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: The Waiting is the hardest part. The anticipation of the next face shot, of an uncut heli run, and of an approaching storm is enough to drive this group of skiers to devote their entire lives to the pursuit of a sport and a lifestyle.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: The incredible Cuba trip continues with a visit to one of the most colorful cities in the world, Trinidad, where Sorin finds the human Google version. After being surprised by a street performer who seems to know too much, the host settles for a few days in Santiago. Here, Sorin is in for a treat and embraces a new group of friends. He visits an African priest who reads his past and future and tells him what he needs to do to better his life. One cannot visit Cuba without referencing Fidel Castro. The host goes for a visit to Castros unusual grave. Watch the episode to learn more about this culture and its beautiful people.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina teams up with another entertaining guide called Barry Wolhuter as they get close to a variety of animals in a hide. With over 35 thousand elephants in the park, Karina experiences hundreds of elephants during happy hour. The Hide offer a very unusual spa treatment! Life seems pretty fragile for a moment as they are confronted with a huge male lion.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: The Royal Zambezi lodge is beautifully situated on the Zambian bank of the Zambezi River. Karina manages to catch her first challenging tiger fish, which pound for pound is the most powerful fresh water fish on this planet. She gets to relax in Royal luxury, with unusual company! Karina takes a leisurely canoe trip down one of the mighty Zambezis channels. She wines and dines on an island under the stars. Her safari with Lawrence leads me to the most extraordinary sighting.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: The second part of the Thailand visit shows Sorin embracing adventure to the fullest. If you plan to visit this country one day, this is a show to watch. Going to Koh Samui island has its perks. Incredible experiences, from joining a safari trip to paying respects to cultural choices, are part of this visually stunning episode. Sorin tries to cook Thai food, even though he is not chef-material. James Bond-looking-like islands, elephants, and other adrenaline-rush activities complete the show and this season 1.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Its called La Isla Bonita, meaning "the beautiful island", or also La Isla Verde -"the green island" - as it is the greenest of all the Canary Islands. Every few hundred meters, it offers an entirely different and unique view. From tropical cloud forests, to mountain panoramas and volcanic landscapes. La Palma is an incredibly diverse natural paradise. And that is precisely its greatest asset. La Palma is a place that everyone should visit.

programme.title: Trouble in Lemur Land
programme.desc: High up in the mountains of north-eastern Madagascar lives one of the worlds most critically endangered primates. There are less than a thousand Silky Sifakas alive today and this area of remote rainforest, known as Marojejy-Anjanaharibe-Sud, is their only home.In the past, the rugged terrain here kept the Silkies relatively safe but things are now changing at an alarming pace. This magical place is under serious threat from illegal logging operations as international demand for highly sought-after rosewood and ebony increases. Unscrupulous logging gangs are encroaching on the Silkies last remaining habitat."Trouble in Lemur Land" follows two men, an American primatologist and a Malagasy conservationist, on their quest to protect this rare species, at the same time providing a rare glimpse into the life of this extraordinarily beautiful and graceful animal.The film centres around the arrival of two babies in the group - a glimmer of hope in an otherwise desperate situation. Lemur reproduction rates are slow and Silkies only mate one day in the year, so it is a very special moment when primatologist Erik Patel sees the newborns for the first time. He has a permanent camp on the outskirts of their last remaining territory and we are given a rare glimpse into this intimate, close-knit group as the babies develop in the sanctuary of the forest canopy.Meanwhile, taking advantage of long-term political instability, the loggers are steadily extracting Madagascars rosewood for export to China. Although they are well armed and highly motivated, conservationist Desire Rabary is not afraid to confront them, regardless of the risks. He heads up a network of local people who play a vital role in the survival of the forest and its lemurs. Over the past five years, he has worked hard to actively expose the loggers illegal trail of destruction but, as this film reveals, the heart of the problem starts on his own doorstep.This 50-minute HD film brings the forest to life, with stunning images of many of its other species, including the striking helmet vanga bird, white-fronted brown lemur, red-bellied lemur, green tree frogs, panther chameleons and the elusive fossa. This treasure trove of endemic Madagascan wildlife is a timely reminder of what we stand to lose if the environmental issues so critical to their survival are not urgently addressed.

programme.title: Andalusia: The Moorish Architecture
programme.desc: Andalusia, the Spanish territory has a confluence of cultures which is represented in its architecture! Visigothic, Roman, Byzantine and Arab - the structures in the region display all these influences. Between 8th and 15th century, several dynasties from Arab to Berber conquered Andalusia impacting the way of life of people. The film tells this story through beautiful edifices of Andalusia.

programme.title: Costa Rica: Wildlife Under the Rainbow
programme.desc: "The tropical climate and contrasted topography of Costa Rica has fostered exceptional biodiversity, hosting wildlife from both North and South America. From the peaks of the volcanoes down to the Pacific and Caribbean shores, and amidst the dense Cloud forest, the country is home to the most remarkable mammals, beautiful birds, and astonishing reptiles…all in for a beauty contest! Watch the colorful Quetzal and Toucan, listen to the Spider Monkey. As Iguanas battle for the last mango the frogs respond to the Scarlet Macaw wake up call."

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: No country other than France operates an elite military force that invites foreign nationals to serve in its ranks. With a reputation for being a safe haven for individuals with questionable pasts, the French Foreign Legion is a true mercenary army that has garnered signiﬁ cant respect within the global special operations community. This episode of CQB examines a raid by the Foreign Legion on a small airport in Iraq during the 1990 Gulf War, exploring the nature of the Legion, how it diﬀ ers from other special forces, and how it prepares for a wide variety of close quarter battle scenarios in conﬂict situations around the world.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: What stories lay buried beneath the surface, waiting to be revealed? 200 years on from Raffles landing, archaeologists are digging deep and unearthing new artefacts that reshape what we think we know about Singapore. From uncovering evidence of an ancient settlement, to discovering forgotten relics from the lives of people in colonial Singapore and World War 2, they are piecing together new evidence that will paint a story of Singapore over seven centuries. In this three-episode series, teams of archaeologists will look to the land and seas for clues to seek out these lost chapters of history that are forgotten by time, only to be uncovered today.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Weir Mill and the search for paranormal activity takes a darker turn. Will they finally uncover the truth behind the buildings dark hauntings?

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Theres a lot to cover in the oldest city in America. Take a sip from the distinctively tasting Fountain of Youth. Then well cross the draw bridge of the undefeated Spanish Fort, the Castillo San Marcos. Then well learn the true history of pirates at the Pirate Museum.

programme.title: Journeys in India
programme.desc: Caves have held a special place in human development. The Hindu, Buddhist and Jain caves in these two UNESCO sites contain some of the most beautiful carvings and paintings found in Asia. This episode explores the history and relationship between these religions.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: All the essentials for going on, and having a successful safari are covered before our host gets a very special challenge—to find at least half of the "Big Twelve" on one safari drive. Four hours and six (6) very special animals—can he do it using his own rules for a successful safari?

This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Well find out why they called Minneapolis the "Mill City" when we visit the Mill City Museum. Then we march over to the Unions Fort Snelling, the first permanent structure in Minnesota, and then head underground and learn about St. Pauls organized crime hide outs.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Un-Belizable! Were off on a Central American Mayan excursion. We head up the steps of the ancient high temple at Lamanai. Then we take a city tour of the main tourist destination, Belize City. We learn about Belizes colonial roots at the Belize City History Museum and dive the amazing Blue Hole.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: They manage to fly over the first hills of the Chilean mountain range, but fail and fall in a small town and must be rescued. Next to the pilot Cristian Millas we will fly in the Chilean precordillera, aboard a modern hot air balloon.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another. While Europe and Asia continue their interest in the resource rich Moon, The United States and NASA have set their sights on nothing less than manned missions to Mars. Can they manage to go shore to shore on the most dangerous of unknown seas, deep space.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your kicks on Route 66 in Flagstaff, AZ. Duck and cover! Were headed to the famous Barringer meteor crater outside of town. Then we scan the stars for heavenly bodies at Lowell Observatory. Well learn the history of the region at the Northern Arizona History Museum, and finally swing from their many ponderosa pines at Flagstaff Extreme adventure park.

programme.title: Paris - Berlin: Shapes and Shades of History
programme.desc: Paris and Berlin have developed and grown facing each other over four centuries of tumultuous historical relationships and mutual admiration. The architecture and urbanism bear witness of this complex and rich confrontation.

programme.title: Hidden Traces
programme.desc: This documentary series uses cutting edge technology to shed new light on historical conflicts and the characters who lived through them with each episode dealing with a specific event or period in history. The viewer learns what daily life was really like for the common footsoldier during WWI as archeaologists bring their stories to life. An analysis of Napoleons strategy and the impact of the weather reveal why he was defeated by Wellington at Waterloo. Traces of the remains of Hitlers destroyed retreat on the Obersalzberg uncover the extent of the vast structural complex where he spent time with his mistress, Eva Braun. And, many years after the conflict in Vietnam, secret tunnels and unexploded bombs can still be found.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: WW1s First Frontline Cameraman
programme.desc: Geoffrey Herbert Malins is the first war kinematographer in history. The documentary he shot during the Battle of the Somme drew over 20 million British viewers in 1916. For years controversy has raged around the film due to its disconcerting violence and overt propagandist agenda,. Now, new research has proven that most of the scenes are indeed a real minute-by-minute record of the most disastrous battle in British military history. The film is a reflexion on the history of cinema and the ability to document historical events on film.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Uncle Jack: Manhattan Project and Beyond
programme.desc: Narrated by Dan Aykroyd. Tells the story of an individual who owns the largest private collection of World War II artifacts in the world. Over 50 interviews with veterans and survivors of the war help tell the story of the meaning of the over 7,000 individual items in the collection of Kenneth W. Rendell.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Ten years ago, thousands of US and Coalition forces personnel, ranging from elite soldiers to reservists, found themselves in the middle of two conﬂ icts that required an entirely diﬀ erent approach to warfare than they had previously experienced. From special forces units securing vital points of strategic interest and capturing key individuals in Afghanistan. This episode of CQB takes a close look at some of at how special operations were integrated into regular units and how they fought through many close quarter combat situations with a combination of intelligence, high-tech weaponry and surveillance technologies to ﬁ nd and capture Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Mītisks rasu karš, slavas reibonis un narkotiku darījumi liek Čārlzam Mensonam cīnīties, lai saglabātu savu kultu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā ar programmēšanas, narkotiku un vardarbības palīdzību viņš galu galā pārliecināja savus sekotājus nogalināt.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs pārbauda 41 gadu vecas saimnieces brutālo slepkavību Līdsā 1926. gadā, par kuru galvenā aizdomās turamā - 31 gadu vecā māte - tika notiesāta un pakārta.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Mītisks rasu karš, slavas reibonis un narkotiku darījumi liek Čārlzam Mensonam cīnīties, lai saglabātu savu kultu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā ar programmēšanas, narkotiku un vardarbības palīdzību viņš galu galā pārliecināja savus sekotājus nogalināt.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs pārbauda 41 gadu vecas saimnieces brutālo slepkavību Līdsā 1926. gadā, par kuru galvenā aizdomās turamā - 31 gadu vecā māte - tika notiesāta un pakārta.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Pēc ballītes māte atklāj ko neiedomājamu - pēkšņi tuvu draugu loks tiek turēts aizdomas par slepkavību. Izmeklētāji strādā ātri, mēģinot atklāt šo noslēpumu, bet, diemžēl, notiek vēl viens ļauns uzbrukums, kas gan var viņus novest līdz tās autoram.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Karjerists noziedznieks informē Aiovas policiju, ka viņa dārznieks ir lūdzis viņam nogalināt jaunu ģimeni. Kad policists var pierādīt savu vainu, bijušais ainavu arhitekts izvēlas trīs jaunus mērķus aiz cietuma sienām.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Bagāta pāra slepkavība izmeklētājus galu galā noved līdz izpratnei par ģimenes nefunkcionēšanu, alkatību un aizvainojumu.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Izmisis Čārlzs Mensons kopā ar ģimeni aizbēg uz slēptuvi tuksnesī. Losandželosu pārņem bailes, un policija kavē izmeklēšanu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā Mensons negaidīti palīdzēja izbeigt viņa terora valdīšanu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izskata savu izmeklēšanu par bēdīgi slaveno Viktorijas laikmeta slepkavības lietu, kurā jaunai amerikānietei tika izvirzītas apsūdzības par sava vīra saindēšanu Liverpūlē 1889. gadā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Ņujorkas štatā, vietējās "Toys "R" Us" darbinieki saskaras ar neiedomājamo - viens no kolēģiem tiek mežonīgi nogalināts it kā ierasti tipiskas nakts maiņas laikā. Pēkšņi visi kolēģi ir aizdomās turamie, bet - vai viens no viņiem ir maskējies slepkava?

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Strādīgs ģimenes cilvēks saņem otro iespēju mīlestībai, bet vai viņa jaunā sieva ir atstājusi aiz muguras savu tumšo pagātni? Mīlestības apžilbināts, viņa ģimeni drīz vien izjauc narkotikas, meli un nodevīgs slepkavības plāns.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kāda vīrieša slepkavība ārpus mājas Memfisas piepilsētā noved izmeklētājus līdz ziņām par ārlaulības sakariem, sievas slepeno dzīvi, apdrošināšanas polisi un brāli, kurš ir gatavs darīt jebko savas māsas labā.

programme.desc: Ņujorkas štatā, vietējās "Toys "R" Us" darbinieki saskaras ar neiedomājamo - viens no kolēģiem tiek mežonīgi nogalināts it kā ierasti tipiskas nakts maiņas laikā. Pēkšņi visi kolēģi ir aizdomās turamie, bet - vai viens no viņiem ir maskējies slepkava?

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Strādīgs ģimenes cilvēks saņem otro iespēju mīlestībai, bet vai viņa jaunā sieva ir atstājusi aiz muguras savu tumšo pagātni? Mīlestības apžilbināts, viņa ģimeni drīz vien izjauc narkotikas, meli un nodevīgs slepkavības plāns.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kāda vīrieša slepkavība ārpus mājas Memfisas piepilsētā noved izmeklētājus līdz ziņām par ārlaulības sakariem, sievas slepeno dzīvi, apdrošināšanas polisi un brāli, kurš ir gatavs darīt jebko savas māsas labā.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Izmisis Čārlzs Mensons kopā ar ģimeni aizbēg uz slēptuvi tuksnesī. Losandželosu pārņem bailes, un policija kavē izmeklēšanu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā Mensons negaidīti palīdzēja izbeigt viņa terora valdīšanu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izskata savu izmeklēšanu par bēdīgi slaveno Viktorijas laikmeta slepkavības lietu, kurā jaunai amerikānietei tika izvirzītas apsūdzības par sava vīra saindēšanu Liverpūlē 1889. gadā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Ņujorkas štatā, vietējās "Toys "R" Us" darbinieki saskaras ar neiedomājamo - viens no kolēģiem tiek mežonīgi nogalināts it kā ierasti tipiskas nakts maiņas laikā. Pēkšņi visi kolēģi ir aizdomās turamie, bet - vai viens no viņiem ir maskējies slepkava?

programme.desc: Kāda vīrieša slepkavība ārpus mājas Memfisas piepilsētā noved izmeklētājus līdz ziņām par ārlaulības sakariem, sievas slepeno dzīvi, apdrošināšanas polisi un brāli, kurš ir gatavs darīt jebko savas māsas labā.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Čārlzs Mensons satiek pasauli, un mediji nespēj vien beigt tiražēt hipiju slepkavu kultu, ar ko noslēdzas 60. gadi. Kāpēc piecdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš joprojām piesaista mūsu uzmanību?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata lietu par jaunu karavīru, kurš tika notiesāts par ģimenes drauga slepkavību Oklendā, Daremas grāfistē 1934. gada Jaungada vakarā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Vakars Čikāgas krogā kļūst nāvējošs. Rītausma atklāj sakropļotu ķermeni. Policija šķērso štata robežas, izsekojot slepkavu, taču būs nepieciešams negaidīts zvans un brutāla nodevība, kas ļaus beidzot atrisināt šo lietu un atrast taisnību.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Sieviete vēršas policijā - ar viņu sazinājies profesionāls bundzinieks, lai nogalinātu savu partneri -, taču nav skaidrs, vai mērķis ir vīrieša sieva vai mīļākā. Vai policija to atklās laikus, lai viņu glābtu?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad savās mājās tiek atklāta noslepkavota ģimene, policija sāk medības trīs štatos, cenšoties atrast aukstasinīgos slepkavas.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! Šajā sezonā varēsiet sekot līdzi ne tikai pārpratumu un smieklīgu situāciju pilnajai biroja darbinieku ikdienai, bet arī Pemas grūtniecībai. Patiesībā Pemas lomas atveidotāja Dženna Fišere filmēšanās laikā patiešām gaidīja ģimenes pieaugumu. Tomēr Pema nebūs vienīgā mātes cerībās esošā biroja darbiniece. Mazuli gaidīs arī Andžela, par kuras bērnu radīsies mulsinošs jautājums - kurš ir tā īstais tēvs. Turpini dzīvot līdzi biroja darbinieku ikdienai, kas atainota caur ironiski melnu skatījumu!

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Ala Bandija bērnības draugs Čārlijs Verduči un viņa vājprātīgais dēls Vinnijs piedalās augstākās sabiedrības ziedojumu pasākumā televīzijas seriāla "Grēdas virsotne" pilotprojektā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als nevar atļauties karstajai vasarai iegādāties gaisa kondicionieri. Pēc mēģinājuma uzstādīt vecu eksperimentālu modeli (kas izraisa apkaimes elektrības pārrāvumus) Als pārceļ savu ģimeni uz vietējo lielveikalu. Pēc kāda laika pārvaldnieks viņiem liek kaut ko nopirkt, pretējā gadījumā viņi tiks nosūtīti uz apgabala cietumu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! Šajā sezonā varēsiet sekot līdzi ne tikai pārpratumu un smieklīgu situāciju pilnajai biroja darbinieku ikdienai, bet arī Pemas grūtniecībai. Patiesībā Pemas lomas atveidotāja Dženna Fišere filmēšanās laikā patiešām gaidīja ģimenes pieaugumu. Tomēr Pema nebūs vienīgā mātes cerībās esošā biroja darbiniece. Mazuli gaidīs arī Andžela, par kuras bērnu radīsies mulsinošs jautājums - kurš ir tā īstais tēvs. Turpini dzīvot līdzi biroja darbinieku ikdienai, kas atainota caur ironiski melnu skatījumu!

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr direktors Durbins cīnās ar budžeta samazinājumiem, Džeks atklāj, ka viņa audzēkņiem viņu žēl.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad viņa iecienītākie kartupeļu čipsi tiek izņemti no uzkodu automāta, Džeks sāk uzkodu karu ar Studentu padomi. Mērija un Mišela mēģina pateikt nē Stefas nerimstošajai sāncensībai — ar neviennozīmīgiem rezultātiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiji un Darsiji iepērkas līdz neabumam, lai redzētu, kurš laimēs 1000 dolārus pārtikas preču iegādei. Lieki piebilst, ka Kvīnsberijas noteikumi netiks piemēroti.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Braucot uz "apavu konvenciju" Losandželosā, Bandiju automašīna salūzt mazajā Luciferas pilsētiņā, Ņūmeksikā, kur viņi satiek vecu stāstnieku. Viņš iedod karti uz veco zelta raktuvi šajā rajonā. Viņi piezvana Mārsijai un Džefersonam, kuri nāk palīgā, domājot, ka bērni mirst.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Šī ir seriāla pirmā sezona, kurā vairs nefilmējas lieliskais aktieris Stīvs Karels Maikla Skota lomā, tomēr uztraukumam nav pamata, jo īpašais "Ofisa" humors nekur nav pazudis! Šajā sezonā varēsiet sekot līdzi ne tikai pārpratumu un smieklīgu situāciju pilnajai biroja darbinieku ikdienai, bet arī Pemas grūtniecībai. Patiesībā Pemas lomas atveidotāja Dženna Fišere filmēšanās laikā patiešām gaidīja ģimenes pieaugumu. Tomēr Pema nebūs vienīgā mātes cerībās esošā biroja darbiniece. Mazuli gaidīs arī Andžela, par kuras bērnu radīsies mulsinošs jautājums - kurš ir tā īstais tēvs. Turpini dzīvot līdzi biroja darbinieku ikdienai, kas atainota caur ironiski melnu skatījumu!

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks negribīgi piekrīt doties uz pilsētu kopā ar Mariju, Stefu un Mišelu. Tomēr viņa pārākuma komplekss Toledo sievietēm ir grūti pārvarams. Direktors Durbins jūtas apdraudēts, kad Helēna viņa vietā izdara skolas video rīta paziņojumus.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad Džeku vecāku un skolotāju konferencē piesaista kāda skolēna māte, viņš izliekas ieinteresēts viņas dēla Kolina izaugsmē. Vecāku grupa sūdzas direktoram Durbinam - viņi pamana pretrunīgi vērtētu studentu mākslas darbu no Mērijas klases.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als, Pegija, Kellija, Bads, Džefersons un Mārsija atrod zelta raktuves tuksnesī. Als atklāj pirmo zelta tīrradni, un visi, izņemot vājprātīgo Kelliju, saņem maisu, pilnu ar zeltu. Alam un Pegijai ir divas atsevišķas fantāzijas par to, kā to tērēt.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis piedāvā Bandijiem desmit tūkstošus dolāru, ja Baks pavairos savu čempionu suni. Alam ir jāiemāca Bakam pareizi izzināt audzēšanas veidus ar citiem suņiem. Lieki piebilst, ka viss noiet greizi, un Alam ir jauns rēķins. Tikmēr Kellija kļūst par Bada modes padomdevēju un ietērpj viņu viduslaiku kostīmos.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.
